outline.title: The Complete AI-Powered Developer Handbook
outline.summary: Cover slide introducing the interactive command center dashboard for AI-powered development.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/7AoX4cPmWRhx.png; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/u8EiPEND7Sb9.png - The cover slide emphasizes an "Interactive Command Center Dashboard." Images 1 and 2 are high-quality, professional-looking dashboards that visually represent this concept. Image 1 is a clean sales dashboard, and Image 2 includes an "Ask AI" chat feature, which is highly relevant to the AI-powered theme.

outline.title: AI Development Command Center Overview
outline.summary: Overview of the four essential frameworks: TCRIE, RSTI, Thinking Framework, and 5-Step Mastery Method.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/amWTaMGr4wTN.jpg - Slide 2 is an overview of the "AI Development Command Center" and its structured frameworks. Image 3 is a clean, professional dashboard with various charts and data visualizations, fitting the "Command Center" theme and leaving the more specific AI-focused dashboards for later.

outline.title: TCRIE Framework - Your Project Foundation
outline.summary: Detailed explanation of the TCRIE framework (Task, Context, Resources, Iterate, Evaluate) for project management.

outline.title: RSTI Method - Optimize Your AI Prompts
outline.summary: Guide to the RSTI method (Revisit, Separate, Try, Introduce) for optimizing AI prompts.

outline.title: The Thinking Framework - Four Levels of Problem Solving
outline.summary: Breakdown of the four levels of thinking: Logical, Analytical, Computational, and Procedural.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/BR6TSJKoQBT6.png - This slide describes the "Thinking Framework" for problem-solving, moving from Logical to Procedural excellence. Image 7, "The Software Engineering Landscape," shows a lightbulb graphic surrounded by concepts like Design, Development, Testing, and Skills Development, which visually represents a structured, comprehensive approach to engineering thought and process.

outline.title: 5-Step Mastery Method (GRPCI)
outline.summary: Explanation of the GRPCI framework (Goal, Research, Priming, Comprehension, Implementation) for learning acceleration.

outline.title: Complete Learning Pathway
outline.summary: Visual roadmap of the learning pathway from beginner to senior engineer, including tech stack progression.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/zP2UCUpzShfM.png - Slide 7 describes the "Complete Learning Pathway" including the recommended Tech Stack and Deployment Platforms. Image 4, "Modern Web Development Workflow," is a clear flowchart showing the entire development lifecycle from Git Repository to Web Browser, covering the tech stack and deployment aspects mentioned in the slide.

outline.title: Project-Based Learning
outline.summary: Strategy for project-based learning, from MVP to complex applications, using the Start Small Strategy.

outline.title: Technical Implementation
outline.summary: Best practices for version control, debugging methodology, and context optimization.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/UhXsRnkUdyrD.png - Slide 9 covers Technical Implementation, specifically Version Control and Debugging Methodology. Image 5, titled "Are You Ready to Commit?", is a detailed flowchart illustrating a complex software development workflow, including steps like fixing bugs, running tests, and committing, which perfectly visualizes the debugging and version control process.

outline.title: Advanced AI Concepts
outline.summary: Overview of AI capabilities from Basic LLM to Agentic AI and integration tools.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/QmgOpCkfSMv3.png - Slide 10 discusses "Advanced AI Concepts" and the evolution to "Agentic AI." Image 6, "Evolution of Code Generation Tools," explicitly mentions Generative AI and Code Automation Tools in the 2020s-Present, which directly relates to the advanced AI capabilities and agentic workflows described in the slide.

outline.title: Interview & Career Acceleration
outline.summary: Strategies for technical interviewing, building standout projects, and tracking career progress.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/sZSZtN01bbbS.jpg - Slide 11 focuses on "Interview & Career Acceleration" and the "Path to Senior Engineer." Image 8, "Full career ladder," is a clear visual representation of the career progression from Intern to Director, which is highly relevant to the slide's content.

outline.title: Your AI-Powered Development Journey Starts Now
outline.summary: Quick start guide with actionable commands to transform development workflow immediately.
